channel.title: Posts on BBB - BaptBeautifulBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on BBB - BaptBeautifulBlog

item.title: Depth Map Merging
item.author: bapt.hudyma95650@gmail.com (Baptiste Hudyma)
item.description: I’ve been working for some time with a depth camera, to try and make my own visual SLAM system. It’s a difficult task, and for now I’ve made some progress, particularly when working directly with the RGB-D depth map, completely ignoring the RGB part. Those cameras are very handy . They are able to estimate depth thanks to a small infrared projector and an infrared camera. The projector -well- projects an grid, that the camera can pick up and deduce depth informations from.

item.title: Monocular Depth Map
item.author: bapt.hudyma95650@gmail.com (Baptiste Hudyma)
item.description: Use a video taken by a single camera to estimate the depth of objects in an image. A small dip in the world of epipolar geometry and key points analysis.

item.title: Constraint Programming
item.author: bapt.hudyma95650@gmail.com (Baptiste Hudyma)
item.description:
What is Constraint Programming ? What are the advantages/limits ? Can we make a sudoku solver in less than thirty minutes ?

One of those answers is yes.

item.title: Galaxis Generation
item.author: bapt.hudyma95650@gmail.com (Baptiste Hudyma)
item.description: After tackling the procedural generation of planetary systems, I decided to step up a bit in universe and try to take on galaxies
